item.title: Un-schools
item.description: Microschools - LM15 Alternative schools here. Child-directed schools The approach is to not teach, but to assist the child in learning and empower each child to become a better learner and to learn on its own. Freedom is provided to learn what the child is interested in. Freedom is provided to learn to the levels that a child is interested in and capable of. Aarohi beyond Hosur - visit ppt.
